documents.document: Who needs TV... Out with the dog so had to miss the #ChappellHadlee; hear a house load of ppl yell "CATCH IT!" & lose their shit. #NZvAUS
@pritivacant - you're totally right.
Does Trump realise he's not on the campaign trail? All his speeches seem to be about reassuring people he's right for the job. #Inauguration
